Package com.Highspring.ShoppingCart.model

package com.Highspring.ShoppingCart.model
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    com.Highspring.ShoppingCart
     
    com.Highspring.ShoppingCart.controller
     
    com.Highspring.ShoppingCart.dto
     
    com.Highspring.ShoppingCart.exceptions
     
    com.Highspring.ShoppingCart.service
     
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Category
    Each Item is related to a category, each category defines an Item discount rate
    Item
    These Items are previously persisted on an H2 database, these contain the item information, each item can be added to a OrderItem and given an amount to calculate its subtotal price
    Order
    An Order is composed of an OrderItem list, subtotal and total values calculated over the OrderItem list, the subtotal is the sum of all the item prices multiplied by a respective amount, total is the subtotal price plus the tax value
    OrderItem
    Intermediary object, contains both the Item and quantity soon to be added to an Order, an Order can be composed of several OrderItem.
